ygData.subject: RE: soloing
ygData.msgSnippet: Please do not do this. You are encouraging a false notion that impedes play for everyone. Kindly explain that it does not help mana regen and you will be
ygData.messageBody:
Please do not do this. You are encouraging a false notion that
impedes play for everyone. Kindly explain that it does not help
mana regen and you will be helping everyone. Placebos may work
in special cases but reliance upon placebos is dangerous.

Tulvan (Povar)
> If someone in my group
> asked me to play Jig to speed up their mana (a perceived
> notion mind you) - I will happily do it. I'm not trying
> to mislead them, but if it makes them feel better, most of
> the time the extra security makes them play sharper.
>
> It's called the Placebo Effect, a proven psych theory.
>
> Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
> League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
> < Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
>
>
